      • Configuration

        public Configuration(java.lang.String pathToConfigFile)
              throws java.io.IOException
        User should call this constructor. Each line of the configuration comprises: slave_hostname slave_ip_addr port_num private_key_full_path login_user_name workspace_abs_path (separated by tabs)
        Parameters:
        pathToConfigFile - path to the configuration file. (Tab separated)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
